TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , born in DATE and living in GPE . He is represented by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practicing in PERSON . The respondent Government are represented by their agent Ms PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant served in ORG ( ORG ) and in DATE retired from service . His military pension was assessed according to his rank and DATE of service and was paid from ORG . The payments terminated in DATE , following the dissolution of GPE .

However , on DATE , ORG , ORG , assessed the applicant ’s pension , as from DATE , to CARDINAL,CARDINAL % of the amount he had received in DATE . The applicant appealed against that decision and after his appeal was dismissed , instituted administrative proceedings with ORG , which dismissed the applicant ’s claim on DATE .
On DATE the applicant lodged a constitutional complaint claiming that the decisions of the administrative bodies and ORG violated his constitutional rights .
ORG rejected the applicant ’s claim on DATE .
